title: The land owner / developer / Society / company shall hand over PPL with separate entrance and exit for the dedicated use of TMC by way of registered conveyance deed
clause_text: The land owner / developer / Society / company shall hand over PPL with separate entrance and exit for the dedicated use of TMC by way of registered conveyance deed. Such PPL will not be part of proposed society / apartment / owners association. The PPL shall not be permissible in combination with other regulations.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
